attributes.action: Make alchohol and drugs a lesson in every school in this country.
attributes.additional_details: Because in today's society all the stabbings shootings are drug related.Most problems in our communities are drug or alchohol related and it's killing human beings on a daily basis.Heroin and crack almost took my life and being 10 years free from my past i want to fight to save our children form almost certain death .
attributes.background: I want you to teach all kids in all schools this as it's killing people every day causes so many problems and kids need to be aware of the dangers to protect themselves from living a life of hell.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already the case that schools are required to teach students about drugs as part of PHSE education. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
